titles.title: Rim of the Valley Corridor Study Act

To direct the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a joint special resources study to evaluate the suitability and feasibility of establishing the area known as the Rim of the Valley Corridor as a unit of the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area in the State of California, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Introduced. Rim of the Valley Corridor Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a joint special resource study of the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Rim of the Valley Corridor in southern California as a unit of the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.
